TopicTitle: Space center is only half rendering, half the time. Cause = Antialiasing/PPFX

Articles.Content:
http://imgur.com/yuxFi7V

Not sure how to describe it, but since I updated to 0.90 this is happening. This is a completely unmodded install, verified by steam.

Ubuntu 14.04

Intel HD graphics 4000. I just updated to the newest open source drivers to try to fix this.
Try turning off the antialiasing, and don't use the PPFX option as it's known to be faulty, let us know if this helps

Try turning off the antialiasing, and don't use the PPFX option as it's known to be faulty, let us know if this helps

That worked! thanks
Thanks, this also solved the issue for me.
